REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0020 reute d f BC-HEEKIN-CAN-<HEKN>-TO 03-12 0065

TEXT.TITLE: HEEKIN CAN <HEKN> TO BUILD OHIO PLANT
TEXT.BODY: Heekin Can Inc said it plans to build a seven mln dlr Columbus, Ohio, plant financed by industrial revenue bonds. It said construction on the 50,000 square foot plant is scheduled to start in April and manufacturing will start at the end of 1987. The plant will initially make two-piece 6.5 ounce steel cans for pet food. Reuter
